title: Human-Machine Collaborative Simulation for Mechanical Metamaterial Design in Large-Scale Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational engineering concepts and materials science, along with basic VR simulation operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based lightweight VR environment, learners optimize metamaterial structures using semi-automated design tools. Targets students preparing for careers in medical/technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more mechanical properties of metamaterials using human-machine collaboration design methodologies
Learners can optimize metamaterial structures by operating semi-automated design tools in VR simulation environments
Learners can improve optimal design performance by over 20% through feature weighting adjustments and phased design approaches

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
